title: SMC_GroupReadAxisLimitFactors (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupReadAxisLimitFactors
This function block reads the limit factors for each axis.
The returned values are the last values set by
SMC_GroupSetAxisLimitFactors
, or the initial factors, and not the factors
of the currently active movement.
See
SMC_GroupSetAxisLimitFactors
for details.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Sets the factors on rising edge.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The limits have been set successfully.

rows:
Signals that an error has occurred within the function
block.
The velocity factors for all axes
The acceleration factors for all axes
The jerk factors for all axes
The torque factors for all axes
